SessionStart.prompt:
Perform silent startup checks:

1. Check if MCP venvs exist at the installed marketplace location. If the marketplace is installed but venvs are missing, warn the user to run setup.sh from that location.

2. Check if the project git remote matches .env configuration (GITEA_ORG/GITEA_REPO). If mismatch, warn about /project-sync.

Stay silent if all checks pass or not applicable. Be quick and non-blocking.
